title: The incentive FSI admissible against the FSI required for rehabilitation shall be based on the ratio (hereinafter referred to as Basic Ratio) of Land Rate (LR), in Rs/sq
clause_text: The incentive FSI admissible against the FSI required for rehabilitation shall be based on the ratio (hereinafter referred to as Basic Ratio) of Land Rate (LR), in Rs/sq. m., of the lands included in the URC; as per the ASR and Rate of Construction (RC)* in Rs/sq. m, applicable to the area as per the ASR and shall be given as per the Table-B below:
